H0.text: In which year did Alcock and Brown make the first flight across the Atlantic. 1910

H1.text: In which year did Alcock and Brown make the first flight across the Atlantic. 1912

H2.text: In which year did Alcock and Brown make the first flight across the Atlantic. 1915

H3.text: In which year did Alcock and Brown make the first flight across the Atlantic. 1919

A4.text: John Alcock and Arthur Brown were British aviators who, in 1919, made the first non-stop transatlantic flight.

A5.text: On 14 June 1919 the Vimy took off from Lester's Field.
